title: Salmon with Dijon vinaigrette
ingredients: ['125ml white wine vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon dried Italian herbs', '4 sprigs fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon', '1 tablespoon capers, drained', '1 tablespoon oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced', '675g salmon fillets', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 Kalamata olives, pitted and sliced']
